title:Season of Arrivals Wishlist
description: Ideal rolls from Season of Arrivals weapons. Created by eurotransient.

// Night Watch
//notes: The King Daddy of Kinetic Scout Rifles. Overall terrific perk pool. While a lot of great options are available in column four, Explosive Payload deserves special mention for it's overall utility in all situations, but especially for dealing with Champions when scout rifle gets love from the seasonal artifact. Keep one of these handy at all times.
